name: Financial Newspaper Digital Branding Kit
description:
Moneta

from Dot Creative.


Moneta is an imaginary business and economy focused international news website which mission is to inform its audience about the critical and important actions of the global economic scene. We challenged ourself and imagined a portal that offers an original and interesting journalistic tone with a vigorous in-depth expertise in the background.


Derived from the word monetary, we came up with the name Moneta, a brief and communicative solution to gain a positive audience responseattention. We also defined a fresh and contemporary visual identity that articulates the unique and professional values of the newspaper. Stylish branding, clear and fluid user experience with advertisement materials.
